hero.description: A student-run team that designs, builds, and operates a custom search and rescue unmanned aerial system (copied from CUAir lol). Help us achieve our dreams by sponsoring us!

cards.heading: Team at TJHSST
cards.content: We are a group of innovative high-schoolers from the Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology, ranked #1 high school in the nation.

cards.heading: Aerospace Geeks
cards.content: In addition to creating and flying unmanned aircraft for fun, we create a search and rescue UAV for the yearly and international [AUVSI SUAS competition](https://www.auvsi-suas.org/).

cards.heading: UAV Enthusiasts
cards.content: Design and build.  Program and fly.  Crash and repeat.  We love every part of the process.

about.title: About Us
entries: We are the Thomas Jefferson Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (TJUAV) Team, a group of curious and driven high-school students learning about the development and operation of unmanned aerial systems through experience and discovery.

We participate in the annual AUVSI SUAS competition, where we compete with an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) against colleges from around the world.  In 2019, TJUAV placed 23rd overall out of over 75 teams, Visit [https://www.auvsi-suas.org/](https://www.auvsi-suas.org/) for more information.

Working on the airframe, designing electrical systems, engineering a ground vehicle, developing an autopilot system, transmitting data with an aircraft, and autonomously classifying images, we are in a constant positive feedback loop, uncovering new knowledge every day.

sponsor.title: Sponsors
sponsor.description: Put a brief summary of what our sponsors do for us here, along with a blurb to make organizations feel bad about not sponsoring us.  Sponsor us!
